GSD.description:
scsi: qla2xxx: Fix scheduling while atomic

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit 826a9d4a00d1424afa961504aec6298ee92d5053. For more details please see the references link.
